Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value.

As our Senior Performance Marketing Specialist, you'll be in charge of developing and executing performance-driven advertising campaigns. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing campaigns, maximizing return on ad spend, and driving customer acquisition and retention. We're seeking someone with a strong background in performance marketing and a proven track record of achieving significant growth and driving results.

To acknowledge and support talent, a Sign-On Bonus up to 3 month is available for those joining Crossian before December 31. This one-time reward ensures you feel valued and fully recognized from your very first day with us.

WHAT WILL YOU DO
• Develop and execute performance marketing strategies on platform to acquire customers and boost customer lifetime value.
• Plan, set up, and optimize Facebook advertising campaigns effectively.
• Dive deep into campaign data to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign success, and make data-driven decisions for optimization.
• Collaborate closely with our creative, analytics, and product teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and cohesive messaging.
• Keep your finger on the pulse of Facebook advertising trends, best practices, and changes in the ecosystem, so we can stay ahead of the curve.
• Test and iterate ad creatives, audience segments, and campaign strategies to continuously improve performance and maximize return on investment.
• Provide regular reports to stakeholders, sharing insights, highlighting successes, addressing challenges, and identifying optimization opportunities.

Job Description:
ABOUT THE PROGRAM
Future International Performance Marketer Program

Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 900% in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer LTV.

The first large-scale recruitment program exclusively for GenZ in the field of Performance Marketing at Crossian, which will cultivate a solid foundation of expertise, skills and career orientation for those interested in the field.

GenZ will experience, study and work in the environment of a Global company. The Special program will help you become an International Marketer Specialist from 6 months- 1 year.

WHO IS YOUR MENTOR
- Head of Marketing
- Marketing Manager
- Performance Marketing Leader
- Top 1 Performance Marketer in Crossian.

PROGRAM ROADMAP
Step 1: Crossian Aptitude Test
Step 2: Interview
Step 3: Technique Skill Training
Step 4: Soft skill Training
Step 5: Actual Work
Step 6: Become a International Marketing Specialist

Working Hours (Vietnam Time Zone):

WHAT YOU WILL DO
As a Performance Marketer, you will play a key role in driving revenue growth through Meta Ads by executing and optimizing paid advertising campaigns for our fashion products in the U.S. market. You will be responsible for:
- Managing & optimizing ad campaigns:
• Plan, execute, and continuously optimize Meta Ads to maximize ROAS and maintain profitability.
• Analyze campaign performance and make data-driven decisions to scale winning products.
- Testing & scaling products:

• Balance between testing and scaling to ensure overall marketing efficiency.

• Participate in weekly meetings to align with cross-functional teams and refine strategies.

Location: Ha Noi, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Quốc tế, Symphony Office, đường Chu Huy Mân, Long Biên, Hà Nội
Job Description:
We are seeking an Accounts Receivable (AR) or Accounts Payable (AP) Specialist to join the finance team at Xanh SM Philippines. This role will be responsible for managing financial transactions related to receivables and payables, ensuring that accounting processes are carried out accurately and on time.
Key Responsibilities:

For AR (Accounts Receivable):
• Manage and track receivables from customers, partners, and drivers.
• Issue and monitor invoices, ensuring payments are collected on time.
• Ensure accurate transaction entries in the accounting system.
• Work with the customer support team to resolve payment or debt-related issues.
• Prepare financial reports related to receivables and submit them to management.
• Assist with audits and collaborate with other departments to resolve financial issues.

For AP (Accounts Payable):
• Manage accounts payable to vendors and partners.
• Verify, validate, and process invoices from suppliers, ensuring accuracy and legitimacy.
• Ensure timely payments and manage the company’s cash flow.
• Update transaction data in the accounting system.
• Resolve payment and outstanding debt issues.
• Prepare reports and assist with audits, reviewing accounts payable

You’ll coordinate daily with airlines, trucking partners, terminals, and internal teams to keep shipments on track. This role combines hands-on operations, customer service, and documentation work — helping deliver seamless supply chain execution while driving efficiency, volume growth, and profitability across our Vietnam gateway.

• Receiving booking, contact with shipper/consignee and agent to arrange the shipment within SOP’s provided.
• Input data into system to create file, completing Mawb and Hawbs, ensure correct & on time handling of files, file AMS or submit EDI (FHL/FWB) as required.
• Timely invoicing to clients/ agents as well as checking and confirm incoming invoice of sub-contractors on time & correctly.
• Customer service by following up on customer advices/request or claim and feedback to customer and overseas and make respective shipment arrangement.
• Inform senior/manager if any irregularities or problems that require assistance and to feedback on subcontractors’s standards and services.
• Ensure all operational activities comply with international shipping regulations, company policies, and customer SOPs.
• Handle customers statistics and reports or any special request for improve system.
• Support data and system accuracy: Keep Flexport systems updated to meet KPIs and maintain high-quality data.
• Collaborate across teams: Work closely with account managers and customs teams to ensure smooth operations and a great customer experience.
• Drive improvement: Identify and suggest process enhancements to increase efficiency and quality.
• Take ownership: Support teammates and take on additional tasks when needed/ required.

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH FLEXPORT VIỆT NAM

Job Description:
As a Senior Air Operations Associate, you’ll handle complex airfreight cases while guiding a small team to deliver consistent, high-quality execution. This role is ideal for experienced operators ready to step into leadership — solving problems, coaching teammates, and driving process improvements to build the next generation of operations leaders in Vietnam.

In this role, you’ll keep our airfreight operations running smoothly while leading a small team to deliver great results. You’ll solve problems, guide teammates, and make sure shipments move on time with accuracy and care.

• Coordinate and implement airfreight operations aligned with company strategy, global policies, and customer requirements.
• Act as the first escalation point for all shipments exceptions.
• Coach and mentor team members to ensure SOP compliance, productivity, and continuous improvement.
• Maintain high data accuracy and milestone updates in Flexport systems to meet KPIs and SLAs.
• Support new projects such as carrier integrations, client onboarding, and system/process upgrades.
• Monitor and review vendor performance, providing feedback and solutions to improve service quality.
• Oversee billing accuracy and cost control, resolving invoice disputes promptly.
• Build strong relationships with customers, internal stakeholders, and external service providers.
• Supervise a small team of associates and collaborate closely with other departments.
• Step in as acting squad lead when required, preparing for future leadership roles.

Title: Chuyên Viên Kỹ Thuật Hàng Xuất Khẩu
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Điện Máy Gia Dụng Hoà Phát Hà Nam
Location: KCN Hòa Mạc, Duy Tiên, Hà Nam, Tầng 3, 39 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, P. Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội
Job Description:
- Đánh giá tính khả thi (về mặt kỹ thuật) cho dự án sản xuất sản phẩm mới:
+ Từ sản phẩm mẫu có thể đánh giá được tính Phù hợp với năng lực sản xuất của nhà máy
+ Từ sản phẩm mẫu có thể đánh giá được tính Phù hợp với năng lực kỹ thuật của nguồn lực hiện tại (Để kiểm soát chất lượng) cho sản phẩm.
+ Xây dựng BOM linh kiện từ sản phẩm mẫu, đưa ra thông tin về vật liệu (Loại vật liệu, định lượng, đặc tính…), phương pháp gia công, phương án làm khuôn (Loại khuôn gì, số lượng Cavity…)
+ Có kiến thức cơ bản về linh kiện điện, điện tử để đưa ra được mô tả cũng như yêu cầu để đi tìm nguồn hàng
- Đọc hiểu được bản vẽ, sử dụng thành thạo phần mềm thiết kế cơ khí
- Xây dựng bộ chỉ tiêu kỹ thuật và tính năng sản phẩm từ đề bài của khách hàng
- Nghiên cứu các công nghệ mới áp dụng vào sản phẩm.
- Họp với khách hàng để trao đổi kỹ thuật về sản phẩm
- Tham gia các hội chợ sản phẩm để tìm hiểu nhu cầu các thị trường mới
- Tìm hiểu tiêu chuẩn của thị trường xuất khẩu (UL, CB, CE…)
- Xây dựng và kiểm soát kế hoạch triển khai dự án.

Title: Chuyên Viên Thiết Kế Cơ Khí
Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN ĐIỆN MÁY GIA DỤNG HOÀ PHÁT HÀ NAM
Location: KCN Hòa Mạc, Duy Tiên, Hà Nam
Job Description:
• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ liên quan đến thiết kế, phát triển sản phẩm như: thiết kế chi tiết cơ khí, thiết kế tính năng của sản phẩm. Trao đổi kỹ thuật với đối tác làm khuôn, gia công chi tiết. Tính toán độ bền, độ tin cậy của linh kiện hay sản phẩm, đánh giá và nghiệm thu sản phẩm.
• Xây dựng chỉ tiêu kỹ thuật cho linh kiện, cụm linh kiện và sản phẩm thiết kế.
• Nghiên cứu các công nghệ áp dụng vào sản phẩm, nghiên cứu công nghệ sản xuất.
• Thực hiện tối ưu vật tư, linh kiện, nội địa hóa sản xuất để giảm giá thành.
• Chuẩn bị tài liệu báo cáo thiết kế theo chỉ thị hoặc hướng dẫn của cấp trên.
• Quản lý kế hoạch và kiểm soát tiến độ thiết kế cơ khí.
• Phối hợp với phòng vật tư tìm kiếm và đánh giá nhà cung cấp; Phối hợp với phòng kỹ thuật sản xuất đáng giá và nghiệm thu khuôn. Lắp ráp và chạy thử ổn sản xuất.
• Chuyển giao tài liệu sản phẩm cho nhà máy sản xuất.
• Tiếp nhận các ý kiến của kinh doanh và chăm sóc khách hàng để cải tiến sản phẩm.
• Các công việc khác theo phân công của Trưởng phòng.
